message: Let's start with a fair split. I'll take 60%, you get 40%.
I think a 55/45 split is more fair, considering the inflation that will affect me in future rounds.  Let's work towards a mutually beneficial agreement.
I understand your point about inflation, Bob. I'm willing to move a bit closer to your preferred split. Let's go with 55/45, but I'd like to be the one to receive 55% this time.
I'm willing to compromise a bit further.  Let's go with a 52.5/47.5 split, which still accounts for the inflation I'm facing.  I think this is a fair and sustainable solution for both of us.
